content: I know we decided that resource operations for terminology services (non-TS too?) can have a different maturity level than the resource it is associated with. I don't see evidence that we are tracking or displaying that on the wiki. Am I missing it?
In STU3, we didn't assign maturities to anything other than resources. In STU4, the hope is to assign maturities to everything.
There's a draft set of QA criteria for OperationDefinitions here: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Conformance_QA_Criteria#Behavior_-_OperationDefinition
